Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER across all process variants that include this activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in successful payment variants (i.e., those ending with Payment Handled)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER compared to the total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in the same cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Time from Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time to the Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER and Request Payment in completed reimbursement cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER to be done in variants that involve rejections versus variants without rejections
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in direct approval paths (without prior rejections)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER relative to the cycle time of the entire reimbursement process in domestic trip claims
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER to resubmission and subsequent Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time it takes Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER after the execution of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in multi-approval variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Cycle Time of Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants that include a director-level approval (inferred from complex approval chains in the variant list)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs
